segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on her task, it's almost like she's in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing her like this, missing out on what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their mischievousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't take a tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being patient, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's the smarter one in this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing is such a waste, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen next in this little drama.
segments.speaker: PAR
